Articles.Content:
![CfPikde.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/CfPikde.jpg)

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/JdrZZwDf3iE?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

So, I've been gone for a while, and I had a new tank sitting in my warehouse for months. Time to release my Type-10 MBT.

It has a nice bearing mechanism, made specially to resist battle damage. The armor is a hybrid Chobham armor with a skirt to catch missile warheads, it has two concealed and armored crew seats to carry tank repairmen and an unmanned turret with its own light source for target acquisition and confirmation.

The tracks are durable, as long as you drive and turn at reasonable (16 m/s) speeds, and I have a BD armory version of this tank for myself (I need to use it for a RP, so no release here.).

The Type-10 will see another release in the form of a Type-10 PIP. I'll release it soon with better aesthetics for the turret, an upgraded armor module, and more general maneuverability.

[https://www.dropbox.com/s/xuo1wz15k5bkluq/A%20JGSDF%20Type-10_3.craft?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/xuo1wz15k5bkluq/A%20JGSDF%20Type-10_3.craft?dl=0)
